import React from "react"; export default function CartItem(props) { const cartJSON = props.JSON; const {addToCart, removeFromCar, DataJSON} = props; console.log(DataJSON);s return (
₹‎{DataJSON.price - DataJSON.price*DataJSON.discount/100}
₹‎{(cartJSON.price - cartJSON.price*cartJSON.discount/100)*(cartJSON.quantity)}
); }
